details.flavorText: Dero stranglers specialize in capturing living victims, and they are often called upon to aid in abductions.

description.value:
You create a shroud of darkness that prevents light from penetrating or emanating within the area. Light does not enter the area and any non-magical light sources, such as a torch or lantern, do not emanate any light while inside the area, even if their light radius would extend beyond the darkness. This also suppresses magical light of your darkness spell's level or lower. Light can't pass through, so creatures in the area can't see outside. From outside, it appears as a globe of pure darkness.

Heightened Even creatures with darkvision (but not greater darkvision) can barely see through the darkness. They treat targets seen through the darkness as @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed}.
description.label: Description

description.value:
A cacophonous noise blasts out, dealing 2d10 sonic damage. Each creature must attempt a Fortitude save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes half damage.

Failure The creature takes full damage and is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{Deafened} for 1 round.

Critical Failure The creature takes double damage, is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{Deafened} for 1 minute, and is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned} 1.

Heightened The damage increases by 1d10.
description.label: Description

description.value:
You cloud the target's mind and daze it with a mental jolt. The jolt deals mental damage equal to your spellcasting ability modifier; the target must attempt a basic Will save. If the target critically fails the save, it is also @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned} 1.

Heightened The damage increases by 1d6.
description.label: Description

description.value:
You create an auditory illusion of simple sounds that has a maximum volume equal to four normal humans shouting. The sounds emanate from a square you designate within range. You canâ€™t create intelligible words or other intricate sounds (such as music).

Heightened The range increases to 60 feet.

Heightened The range increases to 120 feet.
description.label: Description

description.value: A dero strangler takes [[/r 8 # damage]] damage for every hour theyâ€™re exposed to sunlight.

Requirement The dero must have two free hands, or be wielding an aklys and have one hand free. Effect The dero attempts an Athletics check to Grab with a +2 circumstance bonus. On a success, the target takes [[/r 1d6+6 # bludgeoning damage]] bludgeoning damage. Double the damage on a critical success.
